column2: Cognito Identity Pool Id to used in the web app configuration.
Name of CodePipeline to be created.
Name of Lex bot to be used in the web app configuration.
S3 object zip file containing Lambda custom resource functions
URL of a page showing the snippet to load the chatbot UI as an iframe
CodeBuild project to be created. Used for building the web app with the pipeline.

Browser origin (e.g. http://mysite.example.com:8080) of an existing site that is allowed to send/receive data and events from the web ui in an iframe setup. This is an optional parameter. If left empty, an S3 bucket will be created to host a sample parent site embedding the webapp as an iframe.
Should start with Alphanumeric. May contain alphanumeric, undescore and dash.
CodeCommit repository name to be used as the source of the pipeline.
If set to True, buckets and their associated data will be deleted on CloudFormation stack delete. If set to False, S3 buckets will be retained.
Must conform with the permitted Lex Bot name pattern.

[{u'PolicyName': u'CloudWatchLogsCodeBuild', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'logs:CreateLogGroup', u'logs:CreateLogStream', u'logs:PutLogEvents'], u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:logs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:log-group:/aws/codebuild/${CodeBuildName}', u'arn:aws:logs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:log-group:/aws/codebuild/${CodeBuildName}:*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}, {u'PolicyName': u'S3ReadWrite', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u's3:Get*', u's3:Head*', u's3:List*', u's3:CreateMultipartUpload', u's3:CompleteMultipartUpload', u's3:AbortMultipartUpload', u's3:CopyObject', u's3:PutObject*', u's3:DeleteObject*', u's3:Upload*'], u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:s3:::${ArtifactStore}', u'arn:aws:s3:::${ArtifactStore}/*', u'arn:aws:s3:::${WebAppBucket}', u'arn:aws:s3:::${WebAppBucket}/*', [u'NeedsParentOrigin', u'arn:aws:s3:::${ParentPageBucket}', u'AWS::NoValue'], [u'NeedsParentOrigin', u'arn:aws:s3:::${ParentPageBucket}/*', u'AWS::NoValue']], u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
Used to build the Lex Web UI
CodeCommit repository branch name to be used as the source of the pipeline.
Alphanumeric followed by a colum and ending with a hex uuid type.

version: 0.1
phases:
    install:
        commands:
            - npm install -g n
            - n stable
            - npm update -g npm
            - make install-deps
    pre_build:
        commands:
            - aws configure set region "$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION"
            - make config
    build:
        commands:
            - make build
    post_build:
        commands:
            - make deploy-to-s3
S3 bucket name for custom resource Lambda bundle

[{u'Name': u'Source', u'Actions': [{u'RunOrder': 1, u'ActionTypeId': {u'Category': u'Source', u'Owner': u'AWS', u'Version': 1, u'Provider': u'CodeCommit'}, u'Configuration': {u'BranchName': u'RepoBranchName', u'RepositoryName': u'CodeCommitRepoName'}, u'Name': u'CodeCommitRepo', u'OutputArtifacts': [{u'Name': u'SourceOutput'}]}]}, {u'Name': u'BuildDeploy', u'Actions': [{u'ActionTypeId': {u'Category': u'Build', u'Owner': u'AWS', u'Version': 1, u'Provider': u'CodeBuild'}, u'Configuration': {u'ProjectName': u'CodeBuild'}, u'Name': u'WebApp', u'InputArtifacts': [{u'Name': u'SourceOutput'}], u'RunOrder': 1}]}]
URL of the sample parent page

[{u'Name': u'BUILD_TYPE', u'Value': u'full'}, {u'Name': u'POOL_ID', u'Value': u'CognitoIdentityPoolId'}, {u'Name': u'WEBAPP_BUCKET', u'Value': u'WebAppBucket'}, {u'Name': u'PARENT_PAGE_BUCKET', u'Value': [u'NeedsParentOrigin', u'ParentPageBucket', u'']}, {u'Name': u'BOT_NAME', u'Value': u'BotName'}, {u'Name': u'AWS_DEFAULT_REGION', u'Value': u'${AWS::Region}'}, {u'Name': u'PARENT_ORIGIN', u'Value': [u'NeedsParentOrigin', u'https://${ParentPageBucket.DomainName}', u'ParentOrigin']}, {u'Name': u'IFRAME_ORIGIN', u'Value': u'https://${WebAppBucket.DomainName}'}]
